# metabase Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "metabase" {
  host    = "https://metabase.example.com"
  port    = 443
  api_key = "your_api_key"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `api_key` (String) Metabase API Key
- `host` (String) Metabase API host URL
